originalText.text: I have been a customer of Sadeâ€™s for more than 10 years and I can say with all certainty she is a TALENTED make-up artist. She possesses the skills, creativity and professionalism to work on anyone of all skin types.  She understands the chemistry of our skin and what makeup is needed to bring out your best features.  I love, love, love her makeup line because I think itâ€™s great quality and very reasonable.  Whenever Iâ€™ve used her to do my makeup I feel the most beautiful and I get loads of compliments.  Recently, she did my mom for a family wedding and Iâ€™ve never seen my mother look and feel so sexy.  Sade loves servicing her clients and she is an excellent listener.  Iâ€™ve had my makeup done at various stores in New York City and no one, I mean no one, matches her talent and ability because for Sade this work is not just a job, itâ€™s her calling.

originalText.text: I was introduced  to Sade through a very close friend  of mine, 14 years ago.  My journey with Sade, learning  about  taken care of  my skin has been a BLESSING!. Her natural products has  enhance  my skin. I constantly  getting  compliments on how great  my skin looks. She is an ARTIST. Sade make-up is flawless. I have recommended  so many of my friends to her. They have now become her regular clients. Some  of them live out of town. Sade is  Amazing.

originalText.text: I've known Sade for over 20years!  My Mother & I found Sade at the 125 Mart.  Sade educated us briefly about healthy skincare. My skin needed attention because I had terrible acne. I started using her African skincare and my skin began to heal. Throughout, the years I graduated to using Her makeup line under Sade's loving guidance because I had no clue on makeup application. I tried other makeup lines but always returned to Sade's skincare line because the shades and ingredients worked for me.  My skin is in it's best condition today and I attribute it to Sade's skincare line.  Not only is Sade's skincare line is excellent, the customer service is personalized  to each individual who walks through her door!  Why Sade is so dear to me is that I can purchase my skincare at her shop and get to some great conversations,meet interesting people and leave learning somethings new that I can incorporate into my life and share with others.  Thank you Sade!!!!

text.text: I've known Sade for over 20years!  My Mother & I found Sade at the 125 Mart.  Sade educated us briefly about healthy skincare. My skin needed attention because I had terrible acne. I started using her African skincare and my skin began to heal. Throughout, the years I graduated to using Her makeup line under Sade's loving guidance because I had no clue on makeup application. I tried other makeup lines but always returned to Sade's skincare line because the shades and ingredients worked for me.  My skin is in it's best condition today and I attribute it to Sade's skincare line.  Not only is Sade's skincare line is excellent, the customer service is personalized  to each individual who walks through her door!  Why Sade is so dear to me is that I can purchase my skincare at her shop and get to some great conversations,meet interesting people and leave learning somethings new that I can incorporate into my life and share with others.  Thank you Sade!!!!

originalText.text: Iâ€™ve been going to Sade for over twenty years and to this day, only in dire emergencies will I allow anyone else to touch my eyebrows.  I can always count on Sade to help me to pick out products that are not only on trend but that are healthy for my skin.  Sade provides an experience that is customer friendly and inviting.  Unlike department store counters, Sade offers a relaxed environment where the customerâ€™s voice is heard and skin care and cosmetic packages are customized to meet the individual needs of the customer.   Whether I go into Sadeâ€™s cosmetics for just my eyebrows or for a new look consultation I always leave the shop looking and feeling good.
